price: 92. Nabii Muusa gace waqdi isi toobokoyta Haaruunuk: Haaruunow sinam diinik makkootteeh mangassa tuqbudem tuble waqdi maca koo waassee iyye,
arabic: قَالَ يَٰهَٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓاْ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāhārūnu mā manaʿaka idh ra-aytahum ḍallū
